messages.content: A decade of Conservative cuts has damaged our economy, our communities and driven our public services to breaking point. This election is a chance to change course and shape our country for a generation.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: To provide more doctors and nurses and cut waiting times.
To tackle the Climate Emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.
Bring rail, water and energy into public ownership to give you a better deal.
Invest in our schools and provide free lifelong learning for everyone.
Introduce a real living wage, ban zero hours contracts and strengthen workers’ rights.
Give you the final say on Brexit.

mentions.tacticalSituation: The Lib Dems can't win here. A vote for the Lib Dems or any other party is a vote for Boris Johnson’s Tories.

issues.brexitEurope: Give you the final say on Brexit.
issues.education: Invest in our schools and provide free lifelong learning for everyone.
issues.environment: Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the Climate Emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.
issues.health: Invest in our NHS to provide more doctors and nurses and cut waiting times.
issues.labourEmployment: Introduce a real living wage, ban zero hours contracts and strengthen workers’ rights.

community.content: Bring rail, water and energy into public ownership to give you a better deal.

contactInformation.address: The Labour Party, c/o Potts Print (UK), Atlas House, Nelson Park, Cramlington, Northumberland, NE23 1WG

examples: A decade of Conservative cuts has damaged our economy, our communities and driven our public services to breaking point.
This election is a chance to change course and shape our country for a generation.
The Lib Dems can't win here. A vote for the Lib Dems or any other party is a vote for Boris Johnson’s Tories.
Britain is at a crossroads. It’s time for real change.
Bring rail, water and energy into public ownership to give you a better deal.
Invest in our NHS to provide more doctors and nurses and cut waiting times.
Kick start a Green Industrial Revolution to tackle the Climate Emergency and create high skilled, high wage jobs.
Invest in our schools and provide free lifelong learning for everyone.
Introduce a real living wage, ban zero hours contracts and strengthen workers’ rights.
A decade of Conservative cuts has damaged our economy, our communities and driven our public services to breaking point.
You can't trust Boris Johnson’s Tories.
